text: Kåre Olaf Berg (born 8 September 1932) is a Norwegian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Norway Category:Ski jumpers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:People from Gran, Norway
title: Kåre Berg (ski jumper)
